sentences.en: Analysis of the FQP leads to a clear understanding of the relation between theism and science.
sentences.cn: 对哲学基本问题的分析导致了对有神论和科学之间关系的明确理解.

sentences.en: And now agnosticism is often put forth as a middle ground between theism and atheism.
sentences.cn: 不可知论者通常介于有神论与无神论之间的那部分人.

sentences.en: As a result, despite its enduring importance, the ontological argument has brought few people to theism.
sentences.cn: 作为结果, 尽管有它的不朽的重要性, 本体论的争论把很少人带到有神论.

sentences.en: For simplicity, belief in God will be identified with theism and with the assertion God exists.
sentences.cn: 为了简单起见, 我把上帝信仰等同于有神论和关于上帝存在的断言.

sentences.en: The difference between theism and atheism should not lead to antagonism between theists and atheists.
sentences.cn: 不能因为有神论和无神论的差异而导致信神者与不信神者的对立.

sentences.en: The issue is not which idea - atheism or theism - is more stupid than the other, but that education helps us either to work out or simply to communicate our beliefs, no matter what they are.
sentences.cn: 现在争论的焦点不再是理想的无神论者和有神论者中谁更聪明，而是教育到底是能够帮助我们解决问题，还是仅仅帮助我们和信仰交流，不管信仰到底是什么。

sentences.en: The same applies to ideology, idealism will be replaced by materialism and theism by atheism.
sentences.cn: 意识形态也是一样, 要用唯物论代替唯心论,用无神论代替有神论.

sentences.en: The usual theism is more insipid.
sentences.cn: 平常的有神论则更淡而无味了.

sentences.en: Theism generally comes packaged in a religion.
sentences.cn: 有神论一般都夹杂在宗教之中.

sentences.en: VOICE : How can theism be presented most effectively in modern thought?
sentences.cn: 在当今的思想环境下怎么样才能最有效得表达有神论的思想 呢 ?

sentences.en: We must make a choice between theism and non-theism as they are a couple of irreconcilable conflict and there must be one of the two that is correct.
sentences.cn: 有神与无神我们必须做一个选择，因为这是一组不可调和的矛盾。 其中必然只有一个论点是正确的。

trans.tran_cn: 有神论，一神论，<医>茶中毒
trans.tran_en: the belief in the existence of God or gods
